channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Today’s NYT Connections Hints And Answers For Thursday, September 18
item.description: Looking for some help with today's NYT Connections? Some hints and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: Could Cheese Waste Be The Solution To The Plastic Packaging Crisis?
item.description: Ourobio is turning cheese waste into naturally colored, compostable plastics through a breakthrough bioprocess that co-produces pigments and PHAs.

item.title: Increasing the dosage
item.description: If you’re taking the wrong medication, that’s not going to help. It doesn’t matter how fast you’re going if you’re headed in the wrong direction.
